sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Perhaps one of the most difficult cybernetic enhancement is replacement eyes, for most observers can detect even the slightest error. Athakam MedTech's line of cybernetic eyes passes such inspection, with many agreeing the Mod III is perhaps their finest achievement. Although they are obviously not the user's natural eyes, they grant the user increased visual acuity and recognition.   Users with cybernetic eyes gain +1 Vigilance and Perception.  Models Include: Athakam MedTech Cybernetic Eyes Mod III.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Cybernetic Eyes</name> <number>GEAR0001066</number> <price>7500</price> <range/> <rarity>6</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:26:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2cd2eb602f14a450e0f497eef699b621</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 19:26:07</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
